problem.script: from __future__ import division from loncapa import * answerchoice=lc_random(0,2,1) objects=["solid disk","solid sphere","spherical shell"] answers=["2/3*H","5/7*H","3/5*H"] object=objects[ answerchoice] answer=answers[ answerchoice]
problem.p: A $object, initially starting from rest, rolls without slipping down an incline of height H. Then the $object travels onto an icy (frictionless) incline and reaches a height h. What is h in terms of H?
